message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $20,000.  What are your thoughts?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $17,000 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value of this product. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $18,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $16,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Thank you.
